function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restrictive control measures may not be sustainable","Impact":"Could cause serious additional harms if the socioeconomic circumstances of the urban poor are not addressed","Mitigation":"Develop sustainable control measures that address the socioeconomic circumstances of the urban poor","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms for virtual two-way communication and dialogue","People":"Urban poor in LMICs","Owner":"Local governments, NGOs"},{"Description":"Swift action needed before widespread transmission in LMIC cities takes hold","Impact":"Widespread transmission of COVID-19 in LMIC cities","Mitigation":"Swift implementation of control measures, investment in healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Rapid testing and contact tracing technologies, healthcare infrastructure development","People":"Residents of LMIC cities","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Organizational challenges of epidemic control require meaningful local involvement","Impact":"Ineffective epidemic control due to lack of meaningful local involvement","Mitigation":"Invest in local capacity building, community empowerment, and decentralized decision-making","Technologies":"Epidemic tracking and monitoring systems, community engagement platforms","People":"Local communities, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare organizations"}]}
